post.name: player1
post.note: i karen xreiazetai na exei sto plano mathimatos kai sto mialo tis enallaktikes liseis.

post.name: player3
post.note: I Karen tha prepei na enisxiei thetika tous mathites tis me tin epivravefsi kai epainous.

post.name: player4
post.note: mpori na xwrisi to ma8ima sta 2 ke aloi na linoun fila ergasias kai alloi na diavazoun istories

post.name: player1
post.note: i karen xreiazetai na exei sto plano mathiamtos kai sto mialo tis enallaktikes liseis.

post.name: player2
post.note: i k karen bori na vali stous mathites pio endiaferonta biblia gia na min bariontai k na enoxlun

post.name: player3
post.note: I Karen na diaforopoiisei to mathima tis exontas ipopsi tis pollaples noimosines tou Gardner.

post.name: player4
post.note: na enisxi ts adinatous ma8ites vazontas ts enala3 na diavasun tn istoria etsi 8a prosexoun oloi

post.name: player1
post.note: i karen exei tin ipoxreosi na dimiourgei drastiriotittes vasi twn ikanotitwn twn mathitwn tis.

post.name: player2
post.note: na eksigisei stous mathites oti afta p kanun einai eksisou simantika k oxi mono ta filla ergasi

post.name: player3
post.note: I Karen na simperilavei tin timoria sto mathima gia tn eksalipsi mtis simperiforas tn mathitwn.

post.name: player4
post.note: sts pio kalous ma8ites na ana8esi pio diskoles ergasies gia na ts krata to endiaferon

post.name: player1
post.note: na min peritherwpioi tus mathites outws wste na min peritheriopoioun kai oi idioi oi mathites.

post.name: player2
post.note: na balei timories stus mathites p enoxlun tn ora t mathimatos p.x na kanun katoikon ergasia

post.name: player3
post.note: I Karen na min kanei diakriseis oso afora tin epilogi ton mathiton pou tha kianoun anagnosi.

post.name: player4
post.note: oi ma8ites pou antimetopizoun diskolies na exoun gia diplano tous ena pio kalo ma8iti

post.name: player1
post.note: i karen tha prepei na dwsei poikiles ergasies-erethismata panw se ena sigkekrimeno thema.

post.name: player2
post.note: den prepei na balei mono ts kalous mathites alla k tus ipoloipous etsi wste na prosexun k autoi

post.name: player3
post.note: I Karen tha prepei na lavei ipopsi tis ta endiaferonta ton mathiton gia ta themata anagnosis.

post.name: player4
post.note: na enta3i 8emata pio prosita pros ta endiaferonta tn pediwn ke na epivravevi oles ts prospa8ies

post.name: player1
post.note: kalo einai na prowthisei tin omadiki sinergasia apotelumenes apo paidia miktis ikanotitas.

post.name: player2
post.note: na rotisei ena mathiti gia to thema k na t diksi pos otan den prosexei den bori na apantisi
